video_prompt: Camera slowly pans past glowing fireflies and magical dust. Colorful smoke plumes from a whimsical chimney, shifting from pink to blue. Dappled sunlight filters through a swaying canopy, illuminating glowing windows. Bluebell-like flowers subtly unfurl, revealing clinging water droplets. Luminescent toadstools pulse with light amidst gently rippling grass.
image_prompt: A whimsical cartoon house in a magical, sun-dappled forest. The house has a textured facade, a colorful mossy roof with blue and purple scalloped tiles, glowing windows, and an arched wooden door with a lantern. A stone chimney emits colorful pink-to-blue smoke. Lush green foliage, large bluebell-like flowers with water droplets, and glowing red/orange toadstools surround the house. A winding stone path leads to the door. The background shows a soft-focus forest with dappled sunlight and luminous magical particles. Fantasy, enchanting, fairy tale style. Vertical image. Include "c29" logo in the bottom right corner.
refined_video_prompt: A slow camera pan reveals fireflies drifting and magical dust swirling. Colorful smoke billows from a chimney, transitioning from pink to blue. Sunlight dapples through a swaying canopy, its patterns shifting across windows. Bluebell-like flowers subtly unfurl, shimmering with water droplets. Luminescent toadstools pulse, while grass gently ripples around them.
